I've created a simple email validation function in `src/utils/email.ts`.

The function checks for basic email format requirements:
- Contains @ symbol
- Has characters before and after @
- Domain has at least one dot
- Has valid characters in local and domain parts

Would you like me to add more sophisticated validation?

I've created a simple email validation function in `src/utils/email.ts`.

The function checks for basic email format requirements:
- Contains @ symbol
- Has characters before and after @
- Domain has at least one dot
- Has valid characters in local and domain parts
